review: Things a pos. It works okay with my internet but will just freeze during a show causing me to have to unplug it and replug it from the hdmi port when it doesnt feel like playing usually.
author: corey koss

review: Perfect for me. I have and use a Roku, an Apple TV, a Google Chrome and this Amazon Fire TV Stick. I'm very happy with all of them.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Would 5 star it but it doesn't have good miracast and a TV dongle that cant cast your screen accurately isn't really useful for me. The apps work just like you'd expect them though!
author: V. Langer

review: Fire stick is amazing. Although, I wish the control was easier to use it's a bit clumsy.
author: Amazon Customer

review: took me five minutes to get it up and running. i thought i was going to have to sign into Amazon but it is already there ready to choose what ever you want to watch. only had to sign into netflix and whatever else i have. soooo awesome.
author: amiller

review: Love it and very good price
author: RCAASI

review: I love it!! Never knew I could have prime on my TV awesome!
author: Debbie M Reyes

review: It was easy to set up and that comes from a person who is over fifty years old.
author: Mark Trahan
